revision.text:
This is a list of [[Classes|classes]] that are common to all games; many of them have a special function specific to ZDoom. For classes native to the games which ZDoom supports, see the [[Classes|main article]].
== AI related ==
{{Class|ActorMover}} // Actor Mover {{Class|HateTarget}} // Hate Target {{Class|PathFollower}} // Path Follower {{Class|PatrolPoint}} // Patrol Point {{Class|PatrolSpecial}} // Patrol Special
== Cameras ==
{{Class|SecurityCamera}} // Camera {{Class|AimingCamera}} // Aiming Camera {{Class|MovingCamera}} // Moving Camera {{Class|InterpolationPoint}} // Interpolation Point {{Class|InterpolationSpecial}} // Interpolation Special
== Special Effects ==
{{Class|Blood}} // Blood Splat {{Class|BloodSplash}} // Blood Splash Chunk {{Class|BloodSplashBase}} // Blood Splash {{Class|BloodSplatter}} // Blood Splat {{Class|Dirt1}} // Dirt {{Class|Dirt2}} // Dirt 2 {{Class|Dirt3}} // Dirt 3 {{Class|Dirt4}} // Dirt 4 {{Class|Dirt5}} // Dirt 5 {{Class|Dirt6}} // Dirt 6 {{Class|GlassShard}} // Base class for Glass Shards {{Class|ItemFog}} // Item Respawn Flash {{Class|LavaSmoke}} // Lava Smoke Cloud {{Class|LavaSplash}} // Lava Splash {{Class|RealGibs}} // Gibs (Spawned when corpse is crushed) {{Class|Rock1}} // Rock {{Class|Rock2}} // Rock 2 {{Class|Rock3}} // Rock 3 {{Class|SGShard0}} // Glass Shard 10 {{Class|SGShard1}} // Glass Shard {{Class|SGShard2}} // Glass Shard 2 {{Class|SGShard3}} // Glass Shard 3 {{Class|SGShard4}} // Glass Shard 4 {{Class|SGShard5}} // Glass Shard 5 {{Class|SGShard6}} // Glass Shard 6 {{Class|SGShard7}} // Glass Shard 7 {{Class|SGShard8}} // Glass Shard 8 {{Class|SGShard9}} // Glass Shard 9 {{Class|SlimeChunk}} // Slime Chunk {{Class|SlimeSplash}} // Slime Splash {{Class|SludgeChunk}} // Sludge Chunk {{Class|SludgeSplash}} // Sludge Splash {{Class|Spark}} // Sparks (Activate to throw sparks) {{Class|TeleportFog}} // Teleport Flash {{Class|WaterSplash}} // Water Splash Chunk {{Class|WaterSplashBase}} // Water Splash
== Renderer ==
{{Class|ColorSetter}} // Set sector color {{Class|FadeSetter}} // Set sector fog color {{Class|LowerStackLookOnly}} // Lower stack marker {{Class|SkyPicker}} // Skybox Picker {{Class|SkyViewpoint}} // Skybox "Camera" {{Class|UpperStackLookOnly}} // Upper stack marker
== Player-specific ==
{{Class|PlayerChunk}} // Base class for player gibs detached from the main corpse {{Class|PlayerPawn}} // Base class for all player classes {{Class|PlayerSpeedTrail|PlayerSpeedTrail}} // The speed trail created by a player when {{Class|ArtiSpeedBoots}} is active.
== Sector Actions ==
{{Class|SecActEnter}} // Sector Action "Player Enters Sector" {{Class|SecActExit}} // Sector Action "Player Leaves Sector" {{Class|SecActEyesAboveC}} // Sector Action "Eyes go above fake ceiling" {{Class|SecActEyesBelowC}} // Sector Action "Eyes go below fake ceiling" {{Class|SecActEyesDive}} // Sector Action "Eyes go below fake floor" {{Class|SecActEyesSurface}} // Sector Action "Eyes go above fake floor" {{Class|SecActHitCeil}} // Sector Action "Player Hits Ceiling" {{Class|SecActHitFakeFloor}} // Sector Action "Player Hits Fake Floor" {{Class|SecActHitFloor}} // Sector Action "Player Hits Floor" {{Class|SecActUse}} // Sector Action "Player Uses Sector" {{Class|SecActUseWall}} // Sector Action "Player Uses Normal Wall"
== Bridges ==
{{Class|Bridge}} // Hexen glitter bridge {{Class|BridgeBall}} // Hexen glitter bridge ball {{Class|CustomBridge}} // Custom bridge {{Class|InvisibleBridge}} // Invisible bridge {{Class|InvisibleBridge8}} // 8 Width invisible bridge {{Class|InvisibleBridge16}} // 16 Width invisible bridge {{Class|InvisibleBridge32}} // 32 Width invisible bridge {{Class|ZBridge}} // Visible bridge (Doom version)
== Point markers == {{Class|MapMarker}} // Map marker {{Class|MapSpot}} // Map spot {{Class|MapSpotGravity}} // Map spot (falls with gravity) {{Class|PointPuller}} // Pulls actors towards it {{Class|PointPusher}} // Pushs actors away from it {{Class|SpecialSpot}} // Base class for special spot actors {{Class|TeleportDest}} // Teleport destination {{Class|TeleportDest2}} // Teleport destination (preserves height) {{Class|TeleportDest3}} // Teleport destination (no gravity)
== Miscellaneous ==
{{Class|Unknown}} // Unknown Thing {{Class|WaterZone}} // Swimmable Water Thing {{Class|SecretTrigger}} // Secret Trigger {{Class|SectorSilencer}} // Sector Silencer {{Class|SoundEnvironment}} // Sound Environment {{Class|RandomSpawner}} // Spawns random actors {{Class|SectorFlagSetter}} // Sets misc sector flags
[[category:Actors]]
